name: Bounce ball (itch) (RRenzo)
description:
How To Play

Move your character to hit the ball. Every time you hit the ball your score will go up by one. When the ball hits the ground your score will be reset to 0. Your HighScore will display your best score.

To exit the game simple press Alt+f4.

Controls
  • Q - Move left
  • D - Move Right
  • Space - Jump
Changelog
  • v0.0.1 -- First version
